item.title: MySql常用命令
item.description: 修改用户密码 1 alter user 'root'@'localhost' identified with mysql_native_password by '123456'; 刷新权限 1 flush privileges; 添加一个远程用户 1 2 3 4 5 create user 'remote'@'%' identified by 'password' GRANT all ON *.* TO 'remote'@'%'; grant all privileges on *.* to 'remote'@'%' with grant option; *.*所有数据库下的所有表
